description: [Melcoz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0530) can monitor the victim's browser for online banking sessions and display an overlay window to manipulate the session in the background.(Citation: Securelist Brazilian Banking Malware July 2020)

external_references.description: GReAT. (2020, July 14). The Tetrade: Brazilian banking malware goes global. Retrieved November 9, 2020.
